snippet: A Medicare payment-advisory panel said Friday that Congress should move to cut payments to hospitals for many services that can be provided at lower cost in doctors’ offices.
abstract: Medicare Payment Advisory Commission urges Congress to move immediately to cut payments to hospitals for many services that can be provided at much lower cost in doctors' offices.
lead_paragraph: A Medicare payment-advisory panel said Friday that Congress should move to cut payments to hospitals for many services that can be provided at lower cost in doctors’ offices.

headline.main: Medicare Panel Urges Cuts to Hospital Payments for Services Doctors Offer for Less
headline.print_headline: Medicare Panel Urges Cuts to Hospital Payments for Services Doctors Offer for Less
